title: I'm actually 110% sure I'm the worst ADC in the world, like no exaggeration.
body: WHY IS THIS SHIT SO HARD.

replies.body: ADC is the most team reliant roles, in short, don't blame yourself, blame everyone else! That's step one on your journey to becoming a top tier ADC.

compare your adc skills to a new player

there, you should better about yourself

Was that feel better*

If so it really doesn't make me feel any better hahaha

that's why, I dont play ADC XD
I supported and played top/Jungle may way to gold.
Yeah I never ever do it unless when I have to in Ranked, but when I DO have to I suck so so so much
that's when you play an easy ADC like sivir. XD
I legit just played Sivir in ranked yesterday and went 1/12/12 looooool
hahahaha yes!! this is so me aswell
